name: Blue Light (AdamShohaieb)
description:
Notice: Play in Fullscreen

The aim is to try and reach as high as a score as possible. When you die, you can choose a stat to randomize in the shop with the coins you collected in the match. You're able to die a total of 3 times before you have to restart.  

The game isn't the greatest of quality and their certainly are a lot of glitches but I'm quite happy with the end result especially as this is my first game Jam, and definitely the best game I've made.
